derivation: or יַהְצָה; or (feminine) יַהְצָה; from an unused root meaning to stamp; perhaps threshing-floor;
outline:
Jahaz or Jahazah or Jahzah = "trodden down"
  1. a place in Reuben east of the Dead Sea where Israel defeated Sihon king of the Amorites; site uncertain
strongs_def: Jahats or Jahtsah, a place East of the Jordan
